DOC.brief_title: Patient Perceptions Quality Life Associated With Use Olapatadine 0.2 % Treatment Allergic Conjunctivitis
DOC.criteria: 12 year age old . History ( within past 24 month ) allergic conjunctivitis . Active sign symptom ocular allergy . Ocular health within normal limit , determine investigator subinvestigator . Willing avoid contact lens wear study visit immediately prior study medication instillation 10 minute instillation study drug . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Contraindications hypersensitivity study medication component . One sight eye correctable 0.6 logMAR well eye screen visit . Known history recurrent corneal erosion syndrome . Ocular trauma surgical intervention within 6 month prior Visit 1 . Participation investigational study within 30 day Visit 1 . Pregnant nursing . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
